comment: Just take her. You'll thank me later. Engaging, kind, and clear with her expectations. I'm skipping my next level French class in the summer just so I can take her in the fall.

I love Prof. Knox, I took her from 1001, now 1002, and I'm going to try for 2001. I have never taken french before, so I often feel at a disadvantage, but she is so patient with the class and really cares about our success. She's so relaxed and helpful. Seriously the sweetest teacher I've ever had, and so glad I took her class!
I would not recommend her to take for beginning french. She was confusing sometimes and didn't help me when I went to her outside of class. She doens't seem to care if we pass or fail

She is amazing! Probably the sweetest professor I've ever had and she wants all her students to succeed. You get two "free" absences but after that you get points knocked off your grade. But its worth going to class. And there is homework assignments online like once or twice a week, and a few project/presentations that are really simple. Love her!
